§ 55336. Civil penalty After notice and an opportunity for a hearing, the Secretary of Transportation may impose a civil penalty of not more than $1,000,000 on the owner of an American Great Lakes vessel for any act for which the designation may be revoked under section 55335 of this title. (Pub. L. 109–304, § 8(c), Oct. 6, 2006, 120 Stat. 1650.)
